About.Title: About Me
About.Desc: Introducing myself, Jigar Ahir hailing from the vibrant lands of Gujarat, India! ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³ Fluent in the languages of the web - HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I've delved deep into the world of coding. From crafting sleek interfaces with ReactJS and NextJS to powering up the backend with NodeJS, ExpressJS, and NestJS, I'm no stranger to the latest tech stacks. Databases? You name it - MySQL, MongoDB, and even Firebase, I've got it covered. But hey, life's not all about code, right? When I'm not busy crafting digital wonders, you'll find me immersed in the captivating world of anime, where every episode is a journey and  every story is an adventure waiting to unfold! ðŸŽŒ

DegreePursuing.Title: Degree Pursuing
DegreePursuing.Collage: BHAKTA KAVI NARSINH MEHTA UNIVERSITY, Junagadh
details: I joined my college in 2017. Cleared First Year with a good academic performance.
I have studied basic software engineering subjects like DS, Algorithms, DBMS, OS, COA, AI etc.
Apart from this, I have done courses on web designing, Data Science, Cloud Computing and Full Stack Development.

RecentWorks.Desc: In my recent works as a MERN stack developer, I've had the opportunity to tackle diverse challenges and craft innovative solutions. One notable project involved building a comprehensive e-commerce platform from the ground up, integrating MongoDB for robust database management, Express.js for efficient backend development, React.js for dynamic user interfaces, and Node.js for scalable server-side logic. Through meticulous attention to detail and collaborative problem-solving, I successfully implemented features such as user authentication, product catalog management, and secure payment processing using Stripe API. Additionally, I optimized performance and ensured seamless user experiences by leveraging Redux for state management. Another project that showcased my skills involved developing a real-time chat application using WebSockets, MongoDB Atlas for cloud-based database hosting, and React Hooks for front-end responsiveness.

ProjectsList.description: This project is a React app to generate a creative professional website based on Data provided. The website uses no backend and is free to fork and use.
key_features: Clean and Intuitive Design and Portfolio Showcase
technology_stack: Backend: The website uses no backend
design_considerations: Choose readable fonts for body text and headings and Establish a clear visual hierarchy
Responsive user experience
Cross-Browser Compatibility

ProjectsList.description: A React project to get a track of weekly expenses. It also creates a graphical data to help monitor the expenses on daily basis and
technology_stack: Hosting: Amazon Web Services (AWS) or Heroku
design_considerations: User-friendly interface with intuitive navigation and clear visual cues.
Mobile responsiveness for access on various devices.
Robust security measures to protect user data and transactions.
Scalability to accommodate a growing user base and increasing data volumes.

ProjectsList.description: A real-time messaging application built with React.js and Node.js, enabling users to communicate instantly with friends and colleagues.
technology_stack: Database: MongoDB or Firebase Realtime Database
Hosting: Amazon Web Services (AWS) or Heroku
design_considerations: Intuitive and responsive user interface for seamless communication across devices.
End-to-end encryption for ensuring privacy and security of messages.
Efficient message delivery mechanism to handle high traffic and large user base.
Scalability to accommodate increasing user demand and message volume.
future_enhancements: Integration with video and voice call functionalities for richer communication experience.
Message translation feature for supporting multilingual conversations.
AI-powered chatbots for providing automated assistance and information retrieval.

ProjectsList.description: A React project for monitoring real-time data with a dynamic dashboard interface. It leverages Supabase for data storage and authentication, and integrates Socket.io for real-time updates. apply role based auth guard
key_features: User Authentication and Authorization with Supabase and role based auth guard
Responsive Design for Various Screen Sizes
technology_stack: Backend: Supabase for Database and Authentication
Hosting: Amazon Web Services (AWS) or Heroku
design_considerations: Intuitive and Interactive Dashboard Interface
Efficient Data Fetching and Management
Scalable Architecture to Handle Large Data Streams
Secure Authentication and Data Transmission
future_enhancements: Enhanced Customization Options for Dashboard Widgets

ProjectsList.description: A comprehensive system built with Nest.js and MySQL for managing student information, academic records, and communication between stakeholders. The system includes role-based dashboards for administrators, teachers, students, and parents, along with a chat module for real-time communication.
key_features: User-friendly Dashboards for Admin, Teacher, Student, and Parents
technology_stack: Authentication and Authorization: JWT (JSON Web Tokens)
Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript (React.js) or Next.js
design_considerations: Intuitive User Interface for Easy Navigation
Responsive Design for Accessibility on Various Devices
Scalable Architecture to Handle Growing User Base
Robust Data Validation and Error Handling
Modular Design for Easy Maintenance and Expansion

ProjectsList.description: A dating app built with Node.js that resembles Tinder, allowing users to create profiles, view other users' profiles, swipe left or right to indicate interest, and chat with matches.
key_features: Profile Discovery with Swipe Gesture (Similar to Tinder)
Matching Algorithm based on User Preferences
Integration with Social Media APIs for Profile Enrichment
Notification System for Matches and Messages
technology_stack: Authentication: OAuth or JWT (JSON Web Tokens)
Geolocation: Google Maps API or similar service
Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript (React.js or Vue.js)
Hosting: AWS, Google Cloud Platform, or Heroku
design_considerations: Intuitive User Interface for Swiping and Interacting with Profiles
Secure Authentication and Data Transmission
Scalable Architecture to Handle Concurrent Users
Personalized Recommendations based on User Behavior
Moderation Features to Prevent Abuse and Spam

ProjectsList.description: A comprehensive system for managing shipping operations, tracking shipments, and optimizing logistics. The system includes features for managing orders, tracking packages, generating shipping labels, and analyzing shipping data.
key_features: Order Management: Create, Edit, and Track Orders
Send mail, message and notification for order and invitation
Analytics Dashboard for Shipping Data Analysis
Integration with Shipping Carriers for Rate Calculation and Label Printing
technology_stack: Data Visualization: Chart.js or similar library
design_considerations: Intuitive User Interface for Easy Navigation
Responsive Design for Accessibility on Various Devices
Scalable Architecture to Handle Growing Data Volume
Data Security and Privacy Measures
Efficient Integration with External APIs

Touch.Title: Get In Touch
Touch.Desc: I would love to hear from you, so whether you need a quote, have a question or just want to say hello, please feel free to drop me a line.
